reviewHighlights.text: 100 Cats Mexico is a cozy hidden-object game developed and published by 100 Cats that embraces simplicity, charm, and relaxation as its core design pi...
It wasn't bad.. just comparing it to other games from this developer, this one was too fast, too easy. Not a single cat was missed in very first glanc...
